squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation

Class BumpAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.swing.animation.BumpAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, Animation

    public class BumpAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Animation
    Animates an object moving smoothly in a direction and then bouncing back.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BumpAnimation(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image, java.awt.Point start, java.awt.Dimension cellSize, java.awt.Point direction)
      Creates a bump animation that will travel one cell in the given direction.
      BumpAnimation(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image, java.awt.Point start, java.awt.Point end)
      Creates a bump animation that will travel from the start to the end point and then back.

      Returns true if the component should continue to be allowed to animate.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Description copied from interface: Animation
        Returns true if the component should continue to be allowed to animate. Animations on a loop will always return true so some outside mechanism must decide when to terminate them.
        Specified by:
        isActive in interface Animation

      • getImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
        Description copied from interface: Animation
        Returns the static image associated with this animation. Will typically be the ending image, but this may vary based on the animation style. This method is intended to be called when converting an animation into a static image.
        Specified by:
        getImage in interface Animation
        Returns:
